content: Can touchstone create a Client CapabilityStatement by watching everything that the client tries to do? I would think this would be a model of touchstone as an intermediary.

Hi John,

I have logged your question with our support team and we will provide response at: johnmoehrke@gmail.com
Please use Touchstone_Support@AEGIS.net email for questions and issues with Touchstone. Our support email is monitored and is the best way to have questions and issues addressed in a timely fashion.

Thanks!
